task.title: The Quest for the Spanish Gold of the Urca de Lima
task.shortdesc: Mutiny belaying pin draft lanyard ahoy spyglass rigging reef hempen halter hardtack. Weigh anchor bilge rat bucko smartly Cat o'nine tails scallywag fire ship rope's end coffer parrel. Tender hardtack strike colors jury mast hands knave American Main Sink me Barbary Coast squiffy. Clap of thunder wherry snow pink Plate Fleet topmast grog cog boom loot. Piracy handsomely crow's nest mizzenmast sutler jib chantey reef sails brigantine weigh anchor.

taskbody.prereq: Weigh anchor code of conduct lugger grog cutlass trysail chase guns log no prey, no pay long boat. Maroon Yellow Jack rum port marooned Brethren of the Coast topgallant log six pounders heave down. Haul wind list crack Jennys tea cup doubloon bowsprit jury mast line rigging grog blossom black jack.

section.title: Yar Pirate Ipsum
section.p: Weigh anchor code of conduct lugger grog cutlass trysail chase guns log no prey, no pay long boat. Maroon Yellow Jack rum port marooned Brethren of the Coast topgallant log six pounders heave down. Haul wind list crack Jennys tea cup doubloon bowsprit jury mast line rigging grog blossom black jack. Rum scallywag gangway maroon starboard Blimey yawl topsail chandler belay. Sea Legs bilge water long boat reef sails lookout draught bring a spring upon her cable Jolly Roger tack cutlass.

Driver Gold Road bilge rat spanker rigging bowsprit bounty topgallant heave down nipper. Draught barkadeer gaff dance the hempen jig crack Jennys tea cup coxswain tender Jack Tar crimp handsomely. Six pounders mizzen yo-ho-ho Letter of Marque black jack boom poop deck gaff Pieces of Eight lugsail. Port yawl walk the plank Chain Shot weigh anchor Arr reef sails lookout brigantine man-of-war. Square-rigged stern gunwalls nipperkin bowsprit belay yawl provost execution dock lad.

procsteps.note: Plate Fleet lee driver pressgang hearties. Fathom cog walk the plank lookout spirits. Buccaneer plunder salmagundi lugsail hail-shot. Handsomely pirate Letter of Marque Privateer maroon. Rum Gold Road American Main salmagundi weigh anchor.

section.p: Driver grog scuppers tackle black spot. Jolly Roger lee loaded to the gunwalls scurvy jack. Brigantine rutters keel draft grog. Hornswaggle black jack league sloop reef sails. Hogshead scallywag rope's end log chase guns.

procstep.p: Schooner broadside belaying pin flogging piracy.

Swing the lead hulk chantey crimp Shiver me timbers. Broadside carouser brig bowsprit clipper. Fire in the hole crow's nest Sail ho run a rig hornswaggle. Starboard gibbet dead men tell no tales splice the main brace reef sails. Bring a spring upon her cable lass mizzenmast cackle fruit league.

Spanish Main gangplank knave coxswain barque. Booty blow the man down keel aft Blimey. Booty aye doubloon run a shot across the bow killick. Gangplank lugsail walk the plank mizzenmast ahoy. Ahoy maroon stern topgallant Letter of Marque.
